metadata.title: Skyloa Anti Snoring Devices
features: REDUCE SNORING EFFECTIVELY: The Skyloa Anti Snore nose Clip is designed to gently open nasal passages, maximize air flow and prevent airway collapse to reduce snoring. Provide an effective snoring solution.

SAFE & SORT: Comfortable, Flexible Design, the magnetic nose clip is made of soft silicone, very comfortable to wear and barely visible. Safe, convenient and applicable to any shape of nostrils. You can stop snoring and improve your breathing comfortably and easily.

RELIABLE & OUTSTANDING QUALITY: The new 2021 version of the magnetic nose clip is made of high-quality soft medical silicone. BPA free, ECO friendly, No side effects. The matching box provides excellent protection against dust and dirt and makes the product durable.

EASY TO USE & REUSABLE: Very convenient to operate. Just insert the clip into nostrils, which is able to increase the airflow for better breathing and sleep aid, with no pain or harm to your nose. To eliminate mild to moderate snoring. Anti snore nose clip is reusable and easy to clean with water.
EASY TO STORE AND CARRY: The ultra-compact plastic shell keeps the anti-snoring clip hygienic, dust-proof and anti-lost. It is convenient to carry a set when traveling on business.
description: Do you want to enjoy a good night without waking up by snoring?
Our Skyloa Anti Snoring Devices can provide you a perfect snoring solution to prevent or eliminate snoring.
The device is designed as a magnet nose clip that is convenient and comfortable to use while sleeping. It helps widen the nasal passage and maximize air flow which is good to prevent snoring!
High-Quality & Safe Material:
Outstanding Quality Soft Medical Silicone and Magnetic,  Free of BPA and other chemical blowing agents.
Nose Clip Size:
Clip Size: 2 x 1.5cm / 0.78 x 0.59inch (L x W) Clip Case Size: 3.5 x 1.1cm / 1.37 x 0.43inch (Dia x Thickness)
Package includes: 4  x Anti Snore Clip 4 x Protective case
Features:
➤Safe, soft and comfortable.
➤Applicable to any shape of nostrils, satisfy the need of most people
➤Easy to use, no surgery, no mask.
➤Reusable, portable, travel-friendly, easy to clean.
➤Made of flexible and comfortable silicone materials.
➤No pain or harm to your nose, can maximize the airflow to improve breathing and eliminate mild to moderate snoring.
➤It can fit the nostrils gently and appropriately and help you breathe smoothly.
Direction:
1. Insert 2 sides of the clip completely into nostrils.
2. The bottom of the clip should touch the nasal septum.
3. It’s better to wear the anti snoring clip 5-15 minutes prior to bedtime, and wear it through the night.
Note:
The clip might give you the uncomfortable feeling for the first couple of times, please keep trying. The discomfort will disappear within a few days.
Please rinse the clip off with water after every use, and store in the provided case.
Sleep in a side position.

title: This device is easy to use and it's very comfortable!
Product is easy and comfortable to use
Didn’t work
It works pretty well!
